title: Can we use phones in the Pala Brilliant Study Centre and hostel? - Quora

response.answer_text: You are allowed to bring a mobile phone ( only basephones without camera, no smartphones ) if you are staying at a hostel, but you have to handover the phone to the respective warden within a week. I was a JEE mains repeater and was staying at St.Mary’s hostel run by Brilliant. Things are quiet strict at brilliant hostels than the other ones .We had lady teachers as warden and were getting phone thrice in a week for exactly 30 minutes. Also mobile phones are strictly prohibited in the campus.Anyway landphones are available at the campus for making calls if necessary. If you are staying in a privately managed hostel or as a paying guest.. ,then u will be having limited restrictions..free to use mobile phones at anytime and there is a lot of chances to get distracted from studies. So I always prefer brilliant hostels ..try to get into a best one and concentrate on study.. Upvote if you think my content is helpful..

It actually depends on the hostle you select. You are not permitted to keep mobile phones with you for the whole day because it can distract u a lot….considering this brilliant hostle wont permit its students to have their mobile. I am from one of the best brilliant hostle ….they permitted us to use mobile phones( ofcourse not an amdriod one but a base set) for three days a week …a hour a day to call our parents which help us to relieve our stress. But in some paying guest hostle i heard they are not at all strict about phone usage . In brilliant campus…phones are strictly banned .they used to produce notices amd announcement regarding thus. But brilliant authorities help its students a lot by provinding coin booth in case of emergency ..

Phones are off course allowed in PRIVATE HOSTEL or BRILLIANT HOSTELS. However the timings and days for using phone are different in different hostels. I heard from my friends who are studying in brilliant hostels that they will get only 30 minutes for using the phone and that too twice in a week. But in my hostel (PRIVATE), we can use phone for 1 hour and that too everyday !!! Our hostel is also not strict about phone usage, that sometimes we do not even give phone tray to them. and they too will not ask about it. However it is not the same case for every private hostels.

You definitely can’t use it in the main campuses but you can definitely use in the hostels. Hostels managed directly by brilliant will often have their own calling schedules when you can use your phones for exactly 1 hour. NB: you can only use basic phones in brilliant hostels but you can use it any way you like in the paying guest hostels and other privately managed ones.

For accommodation at brilliant you have two options you could either stay as a paying guest or in a hostel managed by brilliant . If you are staying in a hostel of brilliant then you are not allowed to use a phone in hostel or campus.However you can bring a basic model phone (samsung guru or nokia 3310 for eg ) which you are given 3–4 times a week for 30–60 mins to make phone calls.however if you are Staying as a paying guest you can use any phone of your liking at your house but not at the campus.

About phone, rules are same in all hostels whether it is private or it is brilliant hostel. Phones will be given to us 3 times a week (alternate days) for 30 - 45 min depending on the hostel. U can only use base model phones but I have heard that in one private hostel smart phones were allowed. But it is better to bring base model phones as smart phones will be damaged if u don't charge it properly or use it carefully. If anyone has any kind of doubt, u can freely ask me
